column5: We will be fishing the Sen Bay, Deception Bay, and Bear Narrows areas from July 21-27. I would appreciate information (color, depth, preferred bait, etc.) from anyone returning from there between now and then. The 11 months and 3 weeks between trips gets longer every year!

We will be fishing the Sen Bay, Deception Bay, and Bear Narrows areas from July 21-27. I would appreciate information (color, depth, preferred bait, etc.) from anyone returning from there between now and then. The 11 months and 3 weeks between trips gets longer every year!
We'll be coming back from there at the end of this week... I'll post when I get back.
